name: Fireworks XII
description: I was seven, when Dad bought me a Kaleidoscope. It was the first time i experienced something weird and surreal but beautiful. I still remember those patterns it made.  I wanted to remake something similar to the one i saw years ago.  Made in After Effects using different animated shape layers and the kaleidoscope effect added on top to create this beautiful artwork.  Fireworks XII is a part of my Kaleida collection on Rarible [please check it out].  And similar to what i did on Rarible, the collectors of Fireworks II are eligible to win an edition from the ETH Firework Collection.
